description.value: Upon reaching 20th level, you become one with the spirits of your ancestors. You gain a bonus on Will saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier, blindsense out to a range of 60 feet, and a +4 bonus on your caster level for all divination spells. You can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{Astral Projection} as a spell-like ability once per day without requiring material components.

target.value: you plus one additional willing creature touched per two caster levels
